AI

Interface Intelligence


  • public interface Intelligence
    Represents an intelligent actor which is used to make choices for the corresponding player.

    Part of the AI API: custom AI's should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Daan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card chooseCard(java.util.List<Card> hand, InformationHandle info)
      Chooses a card to play from the given list of cards.
      boolean chooseToKnock(java.util.List<Card> hand, Suit trump)
      Decides whether or not to knock with the given trump and hand.
      Suit chooseTrump(java.util.List<Card> hand)
      Chooses a suit to be trump.
      java.lang.String identify()
      Returns an identifier/name for the Intelligence.
      void notify(java.util.List<Card> hand, InformationHandle info)
      A stateful Intelligence updates its state to reflect the changes in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseCard

        Card chooseCard(java.util.List<Card> hand,
              InformationHandle info)
        Chooses a card to play from the given list of cards.

        System usage: If an invalid card is returned, the system will throw an exception and the program will terminate. You can use the info.isValid(Card) method to check whether the card is valid.
        Parameters:
        hand - The list of cards in the hand of the player.
        info - An object ask questions to the system.
        Returns:
        the chosen card

      • chooseTrump

        Suit chooseTrump(java.util.List<Card> hand)
        Chooses a suit to be trump.
        Parameters:
        hand - The list of cards in the hand of the player.
        Returns:
        the chosen suit

      • notify

        void notify(java.util.List<Card> hand,
          InformationHandle info)
        A stateful Intelligence updates its state to reflect the changes in the game. Implementing this is optional.

        System usage: this method is called every time someone plays a card. (including the player corresponding to this Intelligence)
        Parameters:
        hand - The list of cards in the hand of the player.
        info - An object ask questions to the system.

      • identify

        java.lang.String identify()
        Returns an identifier/name for the Intelligence.
        Returns:

      • chooseToKnock

        boolean chooseToKnock(java.util.List<Card> hand,
                    Suit trump)
        Decides whether or not to knock with the given trump and hand.
        Parameters:
        hand - The list of cards in the hand of the player.
        trump - The trump suit.
        Returns:
        True if the Intelligence decides to knock
